level.heading: Records.
level.text: The Mayor shall, at all reasonable times, make books, records, and files available to insurance company representatives for the purpose of examining any matter coming within the scope of the chapter and the insurance laws of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-40, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-1201.
